gameDetails.name: Tiny Towns: FLGS and Larkstone Promo Cards
gameDetails.description:
Two special promo cards for Tiny Towns!

Larkstone:
This Monument scores after all other scoring. Score points based on the number of players with more points than you.
0 = 0 points
1 = 3 points
2 = 5 points
3 = 7 points
4 = 8 points
5+ = 9 points

Friendly Local Game Store:
1 point. +2 additional points if 2 or more fed Cottages are in the same row and column Yellow Buildings. +1 additional point if there are at least 5 Cottages in your town.
